name: World of Solitaire: Card game
description:
The Card Games you enjoyed in your Windows PC, Klondike Solitaire.
When waiting for the bus, 30 minutes before bed, or even in a long-time flight, World of Solitaire: Klondike will always help you enjoy the best of FUN!

Lots of FUN!
- Challenging FUN: Clear 5,000 Stages
- New FUN: Collect Stars and open new Chapters
- Collecting FUN: Collect Trophies with Daily Challenges
- Decorating FUN: Set up themes, with any taste you want!


Wherever, Whenever!
- No Wifi Mode: Play anywhere, anytime!
- Easy Control: A single finger is all you need!
- Left - Hand Mode: We offer a left-hand mode for left-handers!

World of Solitaire: Klondike Customer Service - solitaire@help.neowiz.com
